name: Tanglefoot
description: A circular area with a 4 hex radius up to 10 hexes away from the caster is targeted.  Within the area, entangling vines appear out of the ground.  All creatures in the area suffer a 40 plus 3 points per caster level movement penalty.  The effect lasts for 3 rounds plus one round per 4 caster levels.

upgrades.description: With Crushing Vines, each round, hostile creatures in the area of effect have a 50% chance of needing a physical resistance check or becoming immobilized for one round and taking 1 to 6 blunt damage.
With Deadly Vines, hostile creatures in the area of effect take 1 to 6 plus one per four caster levels piercing damage each round.
